description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. The Mayan calendar predicts the end of the world to fall December 21, 2012. To find the true answers to this prophecy Frank Mors finds himself in the middle of a zombie attack. Frank soon realizes that he’s the only one that can stop the prophecy and save the world.
description.short: The Mayan calendar predicts the end of the world to fall December 21, 2012. To find the true answers to this prophecy Frank Mors finds himself in the middle of a zombie attack. Frank soon realizes that he’s the only one that can stop the prophecy and save the world.
